rows.label: qev085903_MSG0001
rows.name: Now this is a stunning specimen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085903_MSG0002
rows.name: It better be, considering what we had to go through to get it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085903_MSG0003
rows.name: So, um... How much to put that in a bracelet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085903_MSG0007
rows.name: I tested its hardnessâ€”that rock puts even diamonds to shame.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085903_MSG0009
rows.name: I'd really like to help, but my tools just can't handle it, sorry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085903_MSG0010
rows.name:
Shingo, was it? Mmm. I feel bad for the boy.
I usually don't have trouble working with rocks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085903_MSG0011
rows.name:
But if it's tougher than diamond, then my machinery
won't be able to handle it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085903_MSG0012
rows.name:
You can try your luck elsewhere, but it's going to take
some military-grade tech. Maybe even more than that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085903_MSG0013
rows.name:
Though it could be that one of the xenos has the tools
to work with a substance that hard.[ST:wait ]
